name: podlite
description: Podlite AI-Assisted Documentation Plugin for VSCode

configuration.title: Podlite - documenting your code with AI

podlite.ai.openAI.apiKey.title: API Key
podlite.ai.openAI.apiKey.patternErrorMessage: Invalid API Key format. Please enter a valid API Key.
podlite.ai.openAI.apiKey.markdownDescription: API Key is required to authenticate and access the [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys).

podlite.ai.openAI.engine.title: AI Model
podlite.ai.openAI.engine.markdownDescription: The AI Model determines the behavior and capabilities of the language model.

podlite.ai.openAI.docPrompt.default: Generate documentation for the following {lang} function {functionText}. Do not add any other strings beside the function and its documentation. Include data about the params and the return, and also a description about the function, do not include examples.{note}
podlite.ai.openAI.docPrompt.description: Use the following keys to customize the prompt: {lang} - lang of sources , {functionText} - selected text, {note} - additional notes

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
